# Enclava

> Confidential AI platform. Run sensitive AI workloads in secure enclaves with data encrypted in use, at rest, and in transit. Open source, zero trust, self-hosted or managed.

Enclava provides a confidential inference API that works with any model, plus ready-to-use applications (chatbots, agents, document extraction) and professional services (deployment, integration, automation).

- [Documentation](https://docs.enclava.ai)

## Products

- [Confidential Chatbots](/products/chatbots.md): OpenAI-compatible RAG-enhanced endpoints for support bots and Q&A systems
- [Autonomous AI Agents](/products/agents.md): Agentic runtime with tool use, multi-knowledge base access, and MCP integration
- [Document Extraction](/products/extract.md): Structured data extraction from sensitive documents with predefined and custom templates
- [Self-Hosted Platform](/products/self-hosted.md): Deploy on your infrastructure with full control, open source
- [Managed Cloud](/products/managed-cloud.md): Confidential AI as a service, coming Q2 2026

## Services

- [Professional Services](/services.md): Overview of expert engineering services
- [White-Glove Deployment](/services/deployment.md): End-to-end architecture, security hardening, and compliance
- [Data Integration](/services/integration.md): Secure connectors to knowledge bases, data warehouses, and APIs
- [Process Automation](/services/automation.md): Custom agent development and workflow orchestration

## Getting Started

- [Get Started](/get-started.md): Choose your deployment model and next steps

- [Blog](/blog/index.md): Articles on confidential computing and AI security
